function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Population movements leading to larger exporters of infections","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Modelled subsidies do not reflect the temporary nature or intended purpose of post-covid-19 responses, leading to misallocation of resources and inefficiencies.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Completely ignoring interaction effects in ieq models","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pilot opening of parks without monitoring precautions may lead to non-compliance with safety measures.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Panic buying and fragility of the existing supply chain model","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Participants may have limited knowledge of the current covid-19 mitigation measures, leading to non-compliance and misinformation.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to regular sporting or exercise routines","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on construction industry","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate adaptation of existing housing stock to the new resilient residential space concept","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for crowded or congested tourist attractions leading to increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid development of noncontact interaction activities in urban communities.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Frequent movements","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Erosion of moral support for compliance over time","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor design of corridors and waiting bays in hospitals","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Self-reported presence of sunlight may affect the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low level of perceived dedication to care of children and dependents","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unsafe and unsecure movement of healthcare instruments during the pandemic.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in outdoor air supply as a result of dbaf usage.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of people movement on the mixing and dispersal of small aerosols","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Community resistance to vaccination","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High visitation to urban parks in july","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased and ongoing energy consumption in residential buildings","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data security and privacy concerns in the context of pandemic regulations","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Allergic respiratory response to pollen","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor calibration of national epidemic peaks in may and june","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dissemination of coronavirus through social contact and movement.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in consumer behavior leading to increased purchasing of certain products","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in ugs visitation patterns during the pandemic","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Creation of a smartphone app giving color codes to citizens based on contagion risk","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of isolation space for individuals with covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of 5g-based thermal imaging for human body temperature measurement may result in privacy concerns and data security risks.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Animal rearing creates a risk of domesticated animals acting as intermediate hosts for viruses to evolve and infect humans.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability of the danger model to accurately capture the usual functioning of the city and the routines of its citizens.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent results in studies evaluating the effectiveness of interventions such as lockdowns, test/trace/isolate programs, and travel restrictions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglecting proper maintenance of plants in buildings can lead to the propagation of pests and disease-carrying insects.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of immunity and effective vaccine for covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Job loss","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Digital exclusion in underprivileged regions","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of mobile device location data for data collection may raise privacy concerns.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy concerns and surveillance societies related to big data analytics","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible influx of covid-19 patients in temporary hospitals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitation in understanding holistic overview of data","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in building trust and transparency between public and healthcare authorities","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ignoring early warnings of climate crisis and pandemics","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise in non-contact interaction post-covid-19","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapidly growing literature on covid-19","category":"Social diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Qualitative approach leading to potential bias in the study results","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"}]}
